# Tabs vs Spaces

This document has inconsistent indentation.

## Code Example

```javascript
function example() {
	const tabIndented = true;  // Tab
    const spaceIndented = true;  // Spaces
	if (tabIndented) {
    	mixedIndentation();  // Mixed!
	}
}
```

## List with Mixed Indentation

- Item 1
	- Tab indented sub-item
    - Space indented sub-item
		- Tab sub-sub-item
        - Space sub-sub-item
